name: DICEY (Flooflez)
description:
Yeah, you are a sentient die. Your human friend wants you to help them win a couple board games at school. Why not?

Spin yourself as you are launched onto the table to try hit that magic number your friend needs.

Originally made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam, but I ran out of time trying to build it.

NOTE: LACKS (A LOT OF) POLISH AND SOUNDS ;-; SO JUST IMAGINE SOME MUSIC I GUESS.

Might do another build if one person says "yeah can you add some sounds please"
